data.name: 荒土之上 On Wasteland
data.detailed_description: This is a sophomore students made the game DEMO, was originally as a personal practice, gradually improve after I found the part program has been very good, so free open to everybody, all art material resources from the Unity store, please forgive me for not art, the game is very simple, you can control a hero in a sealed move on the mainland,  At the same time, monsters will be refreshed on the continent. You can right-click on normal attacks or press Q to attack them with skills and gain experience points and gold, which you can buy equipment (currently only consumables). As you level up, you will become more and more powerful, and the cycle will continue forever

data.short_description: 这个游戏很简单，只需要打打杀杀，升级，收集物品，接取任务，领取升级的奖励，同时购买一些物品来使你自己强大

data.legal_notice: This project is a DEMO for a prospective sophomore student, and I have only completed all the program parts. All the materials you have seen are from the Unity resource store, which is free of charge because of its poor playability. The purpose of releasing it to Steam is to go through the process for the game you have the chance to make later, and I hope you can spray it lightly
